about_the_game:
The world has flooded. Only a collection of islands remain, trading and travelling amongst each other to form a semi-stable society. Vera (renamable) finds herself on the docks of Vadena, an island of winding canals and opulent wealth, after a savage attack on her ship that nearly ends her life. Her near-death experience has left Vera with a gap in her short-term memory, and she roams the island in search of clues of what brought her to its shores. 

Vera quickly realizes that she has been cursed to repeat a single day. Unsure of who has done this to her- and why - she sets out to investigate Vadena as well as its townspeople in hopes of finding the culprit and ending her plight.

  • A main questline as well as side questlines that can be resolved in various ways

  • Female bounty hunter protagonist with customization options for hair and clothing

  • Countless dialogue options to allow for greater immersion

  • A skill system with 15 unique abilities in three categories to allow for differing playstyles and roleplaying options

  • Active and passive skill roles that can sway the narrative in unforeseen directions

  • A map system for fast travel with unlockable locations

  • Two different male love interests: one noblemen with a kind heart, one pirate that's hellbent on becoming enemies-to-lovers

  • Lore-heavy fantasy world with royalty, pirates, and magic

More to come as development continues. Demo will be released for Otome Jam 2025.

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains descriptions of bodily injury, violent threats, strong language, and sexual innuendo.

short_description: Making mayhem, claiming valuables, and breaking hearts may be a full day's work, but the day keeps repeating and you have no idea why. Build your skillset, break your curse, and befriend or betray townspeople in this otome narrative RPG.
